description.narrative:
This project funding will help distribute 100 copies of a special issue of the Indian Journal of Gender Studies. The issue's focus is gender and evaluation.
Distribution at evaluation events will help stimulate discussion and share knowledge with other evaluators, including the European Evaluation Association Conference and the Evaluation Conclave.
Gender and evaluation Earlier IDRC funding supported a group of Indian social scientists in their efforts to develop papers on what an equity or feminist lens brings to evaluation in a range of fields, including: -education -microcredit -health -community-based rural development
This work was developed to create this special issue of the Indian Journal of Gender Studies.
